original_text: So she gleaned in the field until evening. Then she beat out what she had gleaned, and it was about an ephah of barley.
korean_text: 룻이 밭에서 저녁까지 줍고 그 주운 것을 떠니 보리가 한 에바쯤 되는지라

sentences.original_text: So she gleaned in the field until evening.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 저녁 때까지 밭에서 이삭을 줍었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then she beat out what she had gleaned,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그녀는 줍었던 곡식을 타작했는데,

sentences.original_text: and it was about an ephah of barley.
